author: Darrell Etherington
title: Moderna could make experimental COVID-19 vaccine available to healthcare workers by fall
description: There are some hard limits to the vaccine development process that mean we are not going to see any preventative immune therapies to fight the new coronavirus for at least a year to 18 months. But Moderna, which is behind the first potential vaccine to enter …
